legacy.full_text: Chinese top epidemiologist Zhong Nanshan has been conferred the Medal of the Republic, the highest state honor of China. He was decorated for his outstanding contribution in the fight against #Covid_19 in China. He also played a pivotal role in the fight against SARS in 2003. https://t.co/qLnsfT8EkZ

And Zhong is in his 80s! Born in 1936! 
And he is so fit, working out everyday.

China's economic data beat expectations again — July's manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index showed the highest reading since March. CGTN's Zheng Junfeng reports.

@ZhengJunfeng1 https://t.co/SRVVB03bHy
China's 2020 GDP growth forecast has been raised to 2.2% from 1.8% due to improving manufacturing activity.

legacy.name: Ed Yong is not here

value.string_value: A virus has brought the world’s most powerful country to its knees.

legacy.description: Exploring the American idea through ambitious, essential reporting and storytelling. Of no party or clique since 1857. https://t.co/uHeZCz8ahz
legacy.name: The Atlantic

legacy.full_text:
🚨🚨Here’s the big piece I’ve been promising: an Atlantic cover story about the US’s catastrophic mishandling of the pandemic. It’s a full autopsy of what went wrong, every unattended weakness & unheeded warning, every festering wound & reopened scar. 1/

https://t.co/568JBktc7M
An epic read... and an emotional one. Its people out there, real people. People have to think how things have come down to this. No more unnecessary suffering.

legacy.description: CGTN Global Business Anchor 央视英文频道全球财经节目主持人，skier， book writer
legacy.name: Zheng Junfeng

legacy.full_text: the COVID‑19 debacle has also touched—and implicated—nearly every other facet of American society: its shortsighted leadership, its disregard for expertise, its racial inequities, its social-media culture, and its fealty to a dangerous strain of individualism.

Now Tiktok syas it's also in talks with another potential tech company for sale. International companies needs to bear this in mind when they invest in the us.

legacy.description: Bloomberg Originals offers cinematic documentary-style explorations and feature shows at the intersection of business, climate, technology, sports and beyond.
legacy.name: Bloomberg Originals

legacy.full_text:
“A huge crowd has gathered to see the Americans depart.”

Here’s the scene outside the U.S. consulate in Chengdu, China as bystanders witness its closure, @sharonchenhm reports. More @business: https://t.co/1ky7D7XP2K #成都 #领事馆 https://t.co/vQqK05aFHO

Never in my lifetime (born in 1980) I've heard the U.S. closing a Chinese consulate. The Houston consulate was built in 1979, right after Nixon met Mao. 
l've never seen China closing a U.S. consulate either, or any country's. But China had no choice. That's why ppl take pics.

legacy.description: CGTN Global Business Anchor 央视英文频道全球财经节目主持人，skier， book writer

legacy.full_text: Watching K-drama #ItsOkayToNotBeOkay, really impressive. Not some drippy romantic comedy. It's about family, love and healing. #SeoYeaJi is very beautiful. I hear it's trending in all East and Southeast countries. l can imagine. Actually, it's also trending in China.

legacy.full_text: CGTN's Zheng Junfeng looks at how China Unicom, a state-owned telecom operator, is using #5G technology to help mining companies in China. @ZhengJunfeng1 @ChinaUnicomGlob https://t.co/IKLobQaNf2

While some parts of the world uses political reasons to block Huawei, even it's at the cost of a few years of delay of 5G applications and billions more, China has already deployed 5G in its coal mines, improving safety and productivity, and more over proving how powerful 5G is.

legacy.full_text:
#China will release its economic data for the first half of 2020 tomorrow (Thursday). CGTN's Zheng Junfeng takes a look at the country's consumption market, boosted by e-commerce.

@ZhengJunfeng1 https://t.co/z9SwxIjCoR

l don't know about other countries but live streaming E-commerce is really a new hit in China, especially in the first half. There're super stars such as Wei Ya and Li jiaqi on Taobao. There're also grassroots streamers who broadcast from farmland to help sell overstocked fruits.

legacy.description: CGTN Global Business Anchor 央视英文频道全球财经节目主持人，skier， book writer

legacy.description: Author, 'When China Rules the World', columnist, broadcaster, speaker. Chair of @HariVeriahTrust
legacy.name: Martin Jacques

legacy.full_text: #Huawei 1/5 The UK has taken leave of its senses. This period will become famous in our history as an exercise in national suicide. We left the EU, our biggest trading partner. We now decide that China, the largest economy in the world, is our greatest enemy.

I studied in the UK and I treasure my memories there. Still in touch with my host family in Essex, with whom I spent two lovely Christmas. British PEOPLE are kind. Chinese people are also no enemy to any country in the world. Politicians should not part ways with their people.
